name: Lotus Seed and Bird Egg Soup
effect: Decreases Stamina depleted by sprinting for all party members by 15-25% for 900s.
description: A steamed egg dish. The clear, gold colors of the egg custard have been embellished with several lotus roots. Regardless of whether it is breakfast or a post-meal snack, its superior nutritional value can greatly nourish the body.
source: Purchase (Bubu's Pharmacy in Liyue Harbor, Liyue)
